purpose: The email announces the 5th IEEE International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ'25), scheduled for December 13, 2025, at Ural Federal University in Russia. It aims to gather researchers to discuss improvements in code quality through various topics such as static analysis and bug detection. The email also provides important dates for paper submissions and outlines the evaluation criteria for submitted papers.
evidence_sentences: Name: 5th International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ)

We aim to solve this problem by gathering together cutting-edge researchers and letting them share their most recent ideas on static analysis, program verification, bug detection, and software maintenance.
Papers will be reviewed by three PC members using a double-blind review process.
